pr_title: fix(Particles): disable particles, when driver or GPU not supports OpenGL 3.3

timeline.message: fix(Particles): disable particles, when driver or GPU not supports OpenGL 3.3

timeline.bodyText: You have to remove the versions from capabilityNames below too.
timeline.author: kBlaszczyk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -259,9 +259,6 @@ private void checkOpenGL() {
                 GLContext.getCapabilities().OpenGL15,
                 GLContext.getCapabilities().OpenGL20,
                 GLContext.getCapabilities().OpenGL21,   // needed as we use GLSL 1.20
-                GLContext.getCapabilities().OpenGL30,

timeline.message: fix(gl3.3): remove OpenGL3* from extensionNames(used for output, if have problems)
